short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to protect the DeFi community.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AuraTrust flags out search results identifying official Web3 sites and scam ones. When visiting a known scam site, this extension pastes a big warning banner on it. It now flags suspicious proposals in Terra Station as well.
